summary: Black Flag is an American punk rock band formed in 1976 in Hermosa Beach, California. Originally named Panic, the band was started by guitarist Greg Ginn and singer Keith Morris. They are known for being one of the first hardcore punk bands. After breaking up in 1986, they reunited in 2003 and 2013, releasing a new album called "What The..." in 2013. Their sound mixed simple punk with complex elements, and their lyrics were often about social issues. Black Flag is respected for their DIY ethic and has influenced punk culture worldwide.
title: Black Flag (band)
